title: Hat of the Bear Spirit
data:
{{version031}} {{flavour|A fur hat once owned by Ukta, a powerful ogre shaman. It houses the spirit of an especially mighty bear.}} [[File:Hat_of_the_bear_spirit.png]] '''''the +2 hat of the Bear Spirit''''' +2 [[hat]] [[Spirit shield]] ego
+80 [[Will]] (##)
[[Berserk|Bearserk]]s on 20% of melee attacks:
User recieves 2x (instead of 1.5x) HP on berserk.
The [[slow]]ing received after a berserk is reduced. ==Desirability== The '''hat of the Bear Spirit'''{{source ref|0.31.0|art-data.txt|846}} is a dangerous item for melee characters, if only due to the *Rage. However, it does provide some useful buffs. So as long as you can handle the berserk by pre-emptively controlling fights, and don't ''always'' use it, this hat can prove to be somewhat useful. For non-melee characters, *Rage can be safely ignored, since [[Ranged Weapons]], [[spells]], and other non-melee actions don't activate the berserk. Thus, it becomes an overall great hat. Any MP-related negatives from spirit shield are compensated with a great [[willpower]] boost. ===Tips & Tricks=== *Casters can inscribe their held item with !a, so that you don't accidentally trigger Bearserk. *If you try to melee attack with a [[ranged weapon]], you'll fire a projectile instead, which never triggers Bearserk. ==History== *Prior to [[0.29]], the hat didn't cause you to go ''bear''serk. *Prior to [[0.28]], the hat of the Bear Spririt had evocable berserk (instead of *Rage), [[Negative_energy#Negative_energy_Resistance|rN+]], but no buffs to the berserk status. *In [[0.14]] the MR provided was increased from 50 to 80. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Headgear]]
